name: Archery Bastions: Castle War
description:
Archery Bastions: Castle War is a slingshot shooting game! Defeat the enemy and his castle with arrows!

There is a tower of archers at your disposal, use it to capture the enemy's castle. Shoot your arrows and try not to miss!

Let's the castle vs castle battel begin! You must defeat all enemy archers and destroy their towers. But be careful - the enemy troops can outnumber yours, the towers - can be stronger, and the arrows - more destructive!
Using every shot wisely, will be a key to your success!

Conquering all the kingdoms is not an easy task. Fight orcs, humans, monsters and mages! Repel enemy hordes on ships an longboats! Upgrade archers, hire mercenaries, use various types of arrows, and victory is yours!

Archery Bastions: Castle War Features:

- Unique mechanics
- Beautiful graphics
- Easy controls
- Different types of arrows
- Various factions
- Several battle types
- Lots of levels

Archery Bastions: Castle War is a shooting game where all kingdome should bend to one ruler! Load your arrows and join the battle of castles!
